Display Name: Refer-a-friend and you will earn 5% of your referral's total points.
Description (info box/hover text): Refer a friend to Brain Trust's Engage Platform by posting this link to your Wall. You will earn 5% of all of your referral's total points. If your referrals get their friends to sign up, you will receive 5% of their total points, too. That's because FanFueled's patented 'Share, Track, Reward' software tracks your influence across multiple degrees of separation and rewards you for it.
Action Data Description: Sign up for Brain Trust Engage for a chance to win exclusive prizes and experiences.
